page.title: 08A COTSWOLD COTTAGE
page.content: The old stone cottage has two chimney pots, metal guttering and a TV aerial on a roof made of stone tiles.At the front is a garden full of flowers and the lawn is over the other side of the road.The window frames and door are made of wood.The door is very low. Inside the cottage is a small kitchen and living room withn an old spiral staircase going upstairs .The bathroom had only been added ten years ago.Cooking and lighting is done by electricity but there are two large open fireplaces as well.The walls are plastered and each room has a low beamed ceiling. It is very warm inside the cottage but little light comes in through the windows.Planning permission had been given for the garage.The kitchen had been an old shop many years ago.
